changeSet.author: Christopher Tubbs
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.UnitConversion(from_unit, to_unit) SELECT measurementunit_id, measurementunit_id FROM wres.MeasurementUnit M WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.UnitConversion UC WHERE UC.from_unit = M.measurementunit_id AND UC.to_unit = M.measurementunit_id );
